data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rahman, Mohammad Atikur, Kwon, Yong Jung, Suh, Sang Jae (2012): Two newly recorded genera and three new species of the tribe Cedusini (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Derbidae) from Korea. Zootaxa 3261: 59-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280713
